document.full_text: the wisconsin state assembly passed a republican-backed bill on wednesday that will stiffen requirements for voter identification at polling places and was decried by democrats as targeting their constituents.
document.title: wisconsin assembly passes gop-backed voter id bill
lines_and_colors: the wisconsin state assembly passed a republican-backed bill on wednesday that will stiffen requirements for voter identification at polling places and was decried by democrats as targeting their constituents.
